title: Top bankers urge govt to initiate disinvestment process in banks
description: Top bankers at a CII event in Kolkata suggested that the current strong health of Indian banks makes it an ideal time for the government to initiate disinvestment. With low non-performing assets and a solid capital base, banks where the government holds more than 75% could be primary candidates for this process.
